  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.risk.factors.PatientRiskFactor
  • ??????:
    AgeFactor, ChildhoodInfectionFactor, CholesterolFactor, EthnicityFactor, FamilyHistoryFactor, GenderFactor, HypertensionFactor, PriorDiagnosisFactor, SmokingFactor, WeightFactor

    public abstract class PatientRiskFactor
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for risk factors, the hasRiskFactor delegates to the protected version. Caches the result in case it gets checked more than once.
